content: hi there welcome to helmut the junior edition free pattern you might also like his big brother helmut the seagull - cutest ever companion of tom the sailor both detailed crochet patterns on etsy and ravelry feel free to make your personal toy with this easy to follow instructions credit @alpaca craft on instagram and use a hashtag #minihelmut i hope together we ll meet the tons of seagull s friends and find out the thousands of their incredible stories
